meanings.definition: A small projector that is portable and can display images or videos.
meanings.sent1: I bought a microprojector to watch movies on my bedroom wall.
meanings.sent2: The microprojector easily fits in my bag for presentations on the go.
meanings.sent3: During the camping trip, we used the microprojector to watch a movie under the stars.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up as if she had a tiny microprojector projecting happiness.
meanings.sent5: The microprojector beamed a clear image on the blank wall.

meanings.definition: To project images or videos using a small, portable device.
meanings.sent1: I will microprojector the presentation during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She microprojectors her vacation photos on the living room wall.
meanings.sent3: He tried to microprojector his thoughts onto the screen, but they were too jumbled.
meanings.sent4: The artist's words microprojectored vivid images in the minds of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The teacher microprojectored the lesson using the small device.
